pillar: I am struggling to express my true self

questions.preMessage: Expressing your true self is fundamental to your well-being. Let's identify what aspects you find most challenging.
questions.text: What aspect of self-expression do you find most challenging?

questions.preMessage: Communicating thoughts and feelings authentically is a brave step. Let's explore the barriers you're facing.
questions.text: What difficulties do you face in communicating your thoughts and feelings?

options.text: Fear of being judged or misunderstood
Struggling to find the right words

questions.preMessage: Showing your true personality is about embracing who you are. Let's discuss what's holding you back.
questions.text: What holds you back from showing your true personality?

options.text: Unsure about how to express myself
Feeling different or out of place
Pressure to conform to others' expectations

questions.preMessage: Social situations can be daunting. Identifying your challenges can help us find ways to navigate them.
questions.text: What challenges do you encounter in social situations?

questions.preMessage: Understanding and accepting your identity is key to self-expression. Let's delve into the aspects you're struggling with.
questions.text: What aspects of your identity do you struggle with?

options.text: Understanding my own values and beliefs
Feeling different from those around me
Pressure to fit a certain image or role

questions.preMessage: Frequency of communication challenges can vary. Understanding when they occur can help us address them effectively.
questions.text: How often do these communication challenges occur?

questions.preMessage: Being authentic is a journey towards self-discovery. Let's identify the support that would help you embrace your true self.
questions.text: What support or resources do you think would help you in being more authentic?

questions.preMessage: Improving your ability to navigate social situations can significantly enhance your life. Let's consider what assistance would benefit you.
questions.text: What kind of assistance would help you in social situations?

questions.preMessage: Identity struggles can have a broad impact on your life. Recognizing this impact is crucial for finding pathways to acceptance.
questions.text: How do these identity struggles impact your daily life?

questions.preMessage: Effective communication is a skill that can be developed. Identifying helpful resources is a step towards expressing yourself more freely.
questions.text: What resources would help you communicate more effectively?

options.text: Therapy for anxiety or confidence issues

questions.preMessage: Supporting your journey to authenticity involves building upon your strengths and embracing your uniqueness. Let's explore strategies to support you.
questions.text: What strategies would best support your journey to authenticity?

options.text: Guidance on personal values and identity

questions.preMessage: Social interactions are an integral part of life. Discovering tools and methods to enhance these interactions can lead to more fulfilling relationships.
questions.text: What tools or methods do you believe would enhance your social interactions?

options.text: Joining clubs or groups with similar interests

questions.preMessage: Exploring and affirming your identity is a deeply personal journey. Identifying the right kind of support can help you live more authentically.
questions.text: What kind of support do you need to explore and affirm your identity?

options.text: Educational resources on identity and diversity
